alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:57AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, Water over lowest portions of Goos Ferry Road. Cars should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:35 AM CST Thursday the stage was 1.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning and continue rising to 3.0 feet early Tuesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 1.2 Thu 8 am CST 1.3 2.1 2.6 &&
